com.pilot.jword.view
Class PageColumnView

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.text.View
      javax.swing.text.CompositeView
          javax.swing.text.BoxView
              com.pilot.jword.view.PageColumnView
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.swing.SwingConstants
public class PageColumnView
extends javax.swing.text.BoxView

This class is responsible for columns in multi-column pages. PageColumnViews are children of PageBlockViews.
